data.text: Lɔxɔna nde Alatala yi fa Eli rate kore wuluwulu gbeeni. Na waxatini Eli nun Elise yi kelima Giligali yi.

Eli yi a fala Elise xa, a naxa, “Lu be, n bata i mafan, amasɔtɔ Alatala bata n xɛ han Betɛli taani.” Elise yi a yabi, a naxa, “N bata n kɔlɔ habadan Alatala yi e nun i tan, n mi xɛtɛma i fɔxɔ ra.” E birin yi siga Betɛli yi.
Betɛli taan nabi ganla yi fa Elise fɛma, e yi a fala a xa, e naxa, “I a kolon a Alatala i kanna ratema nɛn kore to?” Elise yi yabin ti, a naxa, “N na a kolon, ɛ dundu.”

Eli yi a fala Elise xa, a naxa, “Lu be, n bata i mafan, amasɔtɔ Alatala bata n xɛ han Yeriko taani.” Elise yi a yabi, a naxa, “N bata n kɔlɔ habadan Alatala yi e nun i tan, n mi xɛtɛma i fɔxɔ ra.” E birin yi siga Yeriko yi.
Yeriko taan nabi ganla yi e maso Elise ra, e yi a fala a xa, e naxa, “I a kolon a Alatala i kanna ratema nɛn kore to?” Elise yi yabin ti, a naxa, “N na a kolon, ɛ dundu.”

Eli yi a fala Elise xa, a naxa, “Lu be, n bata i mafan, amasɔtɔ Alatala bata n xɛ han Yurudɛn baani.” Elise yi a yabi, a naxa, “N bata n kɔlɔ habadan Alatala yi e nun i tan, n mi xɛtɛma i fɔxɔ ra.” E firinna birin yi siga kiraan xɔn.
Nabiin muxu tonge suulun nabi ganla yɛ, ne yi bira Eli nun Elise fɔxɔ ra, e sa ti, e yi e yɛɛ rafindi e firinna mabinni, e e makuya e ra ndedi. E fan firinna yi ti Yurudɛn baan dɛ.
Eli yi a doma gbeen tongo a mɔrɔmɔrɔ, a igen garin, a yitaxun be binna nun be binni, e firinna birin yi dangu yire yixareni.

E to dangu, Eli yi a fala Elise xa, a naxa, “I waxi a xɔn, n xa nanse liga i xa, benun n xa ba i fɛma?” Elise yi a yabi, a naxa, “N bata i mafan, n waxi i ya nabiyaan xaxinla dɔxɔde firin nan sɔtɔ fe yi.”
Eli yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “I fe xɔdɛxɛn nan maxɔdinxi n na na ra. Koni n bama i fɛma waxatin naxan yi, xa i n to, na ligama i xa nɛn, koni xa i mi n to, na mi ligama i xa.”
E yi sigatini, e fala tiini, nanunna, wontoro tɛɛ kanna nun soo tɛɛ kanne yi so e tagi, Eli yi te kore wuluwulu gbeeni.
Elise yi a matoma a gbelegbelema, a naxa, “N fafe, n fafe! I dangu Isirayilaa yɛngɛ so wontorone birin na e nun a soone!” A mi fa a to sɔnɔn. Nayi, a yi a dugine suxu, a yi e yibɔ dungi firinna ra,
Elise yi doma gbeen tongo Eli naxan nabira. A xɛtɛ, a ti Yurudɛn baan dɛ,

Eli doma gbeen naxan nabira, Elise yi na tongo, a baa igen garin, Elise yi maxɔdinna ti, a naxa, “Alatala, Eli a Ala minɛn yi iki?” A mɔn yi baa igen garin, na xanbi ra, baan yi taxun, Elise yi dangu.
Yeriko taan nabine ganla to a to wulani, e yi a fala, e naxa, “Eli a xaxinla Elise yi.” E yi siga a ralandeni, e xinbi sin a bun ma.

E yi a fala a xa, e naxa, “Xɛmɛ sɛnbɛmaan muxu tonge suulun i ya walikɛne yɛ, i waxi e xa sa i kanna fen? Yanyina nde Alatalaa Nii Sariɲanxin bata a xali a sa a woli geyana nde fari hanma lanbanna nde kui.” Elise yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ nama e rasiga.”
Koni, e yi a karahan han! A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ e rasiga.” E yi muxu tonge suulun nasiga naxanye Eli fen xi saxan, koni e mi a to mumɛ!
E to xɛtɛ Elise fɛma Yeriko taani, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “N mi yi a falɛ ɛ xa, ‘Ɛ nama siga?’ ”
Taan muxune yi a fala Elise xa, e naxa, “Nxu kanna, taan dɔxɔ kiin fan alo i a toxi kii naxan yi, koni igen kobi han a mi tinɲɛ sansine yi soli.”
Elise yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ fa fɔxɔn na goron nɛnɛn kui, ɛ a so n yii.” E fa a ra.
Elise yi siga tigin xunna ra, a fɔxɔn woli igeni, a yi a fala, a naxa, “Alatala ito nan falaxi, a naxa, ‘N bata igeni ito rasariɲan, a mi fa muxune faxɛ, sansine fan nun fa solima nɛn.’ ”
Igen yi rasariɲan, keli na lɔxɔni fata Elise a falan na.
A kelimatɔɔn mɛnni siga Betɛli yi, a yi tema kiraan xɔn, taa yi diidine yi fa, e yi a magele, e yi a fala a ma, e naxa, “Teli kanna siga! Teli kanna siga!”
A yi xɛtɛ, a e mato, a yi e danga Alatala xinli, sube xaɲɛ magaxuxi firin yi mini fɔtɔnni, e diidine tonge naanin e nun firin yibɔ.
Elise yi keli mɛnni, a siga Karemele geyaan fari. Na xanbi ra, a xɛtɛ Samari taani.
